name: Aviasales WW
name_aliases: авиасейлс, aviasales, авиасейлз, Aviasale, авиаселс, авиаселз
description:
Aviasales

 

Aviasales.ru helps you to find the cheapest airline tickets. We have access to a global database of flights by 728 airlines and 45 flight booking agencies, which allows us to find flights in real time and compare them with each other. The prices you will see are final – you won’t have to pay anything on top.

 

Advantages:

 


	
	Calendar widget can help to see how prices differ from day to day.
	
	
	Conditions on baggage are known from the start.
	
	
	Filters allow to customize a search.
	


 

There are only paid bookings in statistics in Admitad. The average time of payment of orders is 30 min, max is 3 days or 1 month (rarely).

 

Top GEOs:

 

30% Moscow

10% Saint-Petersburg

the rest

 

The target audience:

 

25-35 years old

55% women

45% men

 

Bonuses:

 

Your commission rate will increase to 1.4% (instead of 1.3%) if you have 50+ ticket sales per month.

name: JetRadar.com INT
name_aliases: jetradar, jet radar, джетрадар, джет радар, авиасейлс, авиасейлз, Aviasales, Aviasale, авиаселс, авиаселз
description:
JetRadar is the company that was created in 2007 as an airfare blog by Russian founder Konstantin Kalinov. Nowadays JetRadar is one of the largest online search engines for flights all over the world. Its sister-brand Aviasales is the popular service which online-users also appeal to while looking for the best airline prices.

This service helps thousands of people compare airfares from 552 airlines and dozens of travel sites.Thanks to the JetRadar it is possible for users to track down carriers’ special offers, and book the cheapest tickets available.

Also it provides travelers with great deals on different directions (domestic or international flights), and by using these unique offers the service has already deserved consumers’ loyalty.

There are some undoubtable advantages of the web page:

1)      It is multilingual (users can search in English, Spanish, French, German and Italian);

2)      It is simple in use;

3)      It has a friendly interface;

4)      It is very fast – users can get result in a moment.

The largest selection and the lowest prices for users ensure the best conversion rate. The target audience is wide enough as it is not restricted by any requirements (age, sex, etc.) The fastest travel search engine on the web helps users to find flights to all destinations from all major airlines.

 

Join us!

JetRadar affiliate programm!

name: AnywayAnyday RU UA DE US
description:
Anywayanyday - is an international online service for buying tickets and booking hotels. With the help of an effective system and user-friendly interface can service as quickly as possible to book the most suitable to him tickets and hotels, as well as to pay them in a convenient currency. The company works with a wide range of customers: private and corporate clients, hotels and Internet portals. Anywayanyday offers users a program of accumulation of bonuses and special offers for each category of customers.

Customer Benefits


	Our service is looking for you flight options from 800 airlines and 330,000 accommodation options in hotels all over the world
	3 minutes - the average time it takes to search, select, and purchase tickets for anywayanyday.com
	Our call center operates without breaks and days off. It will help you solve any problem related to your order.
	There are no hidden charges and conversions, you can immediately see the final price of your order.
	Do not want to miss out on a lucrative ticket? Book and pay for it later. Free tickets can book any client who has made at least one purchase on anywayanyday.com, - only need to log in.
	Exchange and return tickets - quickly and more quickly
	Through support - on request in a private office
	Online sharing - through their own personal account


 

Join Anywayanyday affiliate program!

name: Flysmartavia
description:
Авиакомпания Smartavia - первый лоукостер Smart-формата.

Это означает, что авиакомпания предлагает низкие тарифы на перевозку, и дает пассажиру самому выбирать какие опции ему нужны, например, багаж, дополнительная ручная кладь, возвратный тариф, обед на борту, либо не нужно ничего.

 

Обратите внимание на то, что пользователь должен внести оплату в течение 30 минут после бронирования. В противном случае бронь будет аннулирована и билеты вернутся в свободную продажу (такое бронирование может отобразиться с суммой заказа 0 руб).

Преимущества для вебмастеров:


	1. Бортовая система сервиса и развлечений
	2. Низкие лоукост-тарифы (распродажи для подписчиков Smart Up)
	3. Годовая подписка Smart Up
	4. Торговля на борту снеками и напитками
	5. Пунктуальность (с нами удобно планировать и все успевать)


 

Преимущества для покупателей:


	У авиакомпании есть годовая подписка Smart Up, которая дает скидку на каждый билет, багаж, с возможностью взять от одного до трех попутчиков с собой и много других преимуществ, в том числе участие в закрытых распродажах.
	На всех бортах авиакомпании работает система сервиса и развлечений, которая позволяет пересесть во время полета, заказать напитки или еду, а также провести время с пользой, посмотрев лекции, послушав медитативную музыку. Также в системе есть платный доступ к фильмам и сериалам и к бесплатным играм.


98% рейсов осуществляется по расписанию, что позволяет пассажирам эффективно планировать свои путешествия.

 

Топ товары

Рейсы Архангельск – Санкт-Петербург; Архангельск – Москва; Санкт-Петербург – Самара; Санкт-Петербург - Сочи

Целевая аудитория:

25-55 лет, жители городов-миллионников, 70% - женщины, летают один-два раза в год, чтобы увидеть родных или близких

 

Минус слова -aviasales -авиакатастрофа -авито -автобус -алиса -аналог -бархатный -билетикс -блаблакар -бортпроводников -вакансии -вариант -вернуть -видео -википедия -возврат -вокзал -восточный -габариты -гоа -двухэтажный -дебош -делиться -диана -дорога -жд -железная -железнодорожный -женщина -заканчивается -зарплата -златоуст -инн -информация -карта -картинки -катастрофа -кладь -км -комбинированный -конец -контакте -крушение -купа -купейный -курсы -ласточка -логотип -маршрут -модель -молодежь -называется -новости -обмен -обменять -окончание -отзывы -отказаться -ошибка -падение -перечень -пилот -питание -плацкарт -подешеветь -поезд -получать -поменять -порно -посмотреть -посол -правила -проверить -провоз -продолжительность -работа -разбился -размер -распечатать -расследование -расстояние -расшифровка -реквизиты -ржд -руководство -ручной -сапсан -сдать -сезон -скачать -сколько -скоростной -спартак -сторона -стюардессы -субсидированные -схема -тета -траектория -трасса -тур -турция -упал -утро -флот -форма -фото -число -чья -экспресс

 

С Уважением, Партнерская программа Авиакомпания Smartavia!

name: Mytrip.com WW
name_aliases: mytrip, MyTrip, ьнекшз, my rtip, my trip
description:
What is Mytrip
Mytrip is one of the world’s largest travel agents, helping more than 7 million people book flights every year. We work with over 800 airlines, covering 99% of all possible routes – and always at highly competitive prices. We’re active in more than 75 markets, and we make it easy for travelers by accepting most local currencies and payment methods.

The Mytrip affiliate program
Our affiliate program is open to partners worldwide. Whether you’re just getting started or already established, we give you the tools and support you need to grow on a global scale. By joining, you’ll be working with a well-known travel brand and gain access to an international platform.

Support & services
Our affiliate team is excited to welcome you on board and build a strong partnership for years to come. And of course, our customer service is available 24/7, ready to help travelers wherever they are and in their own language.

Terms
A maximum commission of EUR 85 per booking applies, meaning bookings with an order value exceeding USD 2,145 will receive a commission of EUR 85.

Brand bidding is not allowed and will result in immediate suspension from our program. Combinations like "Mytrip voucher codes" and "Mytrip cashback" are considered brand bidding, and will result in immediate suspension.
As a publisher participating in our affiliate program, you agree not to use the following brand names on your sites in connection with promoting our affiliate offerings: American Airlines, Thai Smile, Delta Airlines, Air Canada, Indigo, Air France, KLM, United Airlines, Alaskan Airlines, Hawaiian Airlines, Ryanair.
Publishers are strictly prohibited from using our brand name in their display URLs or landing page URLs. No usage of our brand name in any form within display URLs and landing page URLs.

Cookie period: 30 days

name: Gotogate WW

description:
What is Gotogate
Gotogate is among the biggest global travel agents, with more than 7 million airline tickets sold annually. We offer highly competitively priced airline tickets across 800+ airline companies and cover flights across 99% of all route combinations. We are constantly growing and active across 75+ markets and accept most common local currencies and payment options.

About the Gotogate affiliate program
Our affiliate program is a globally inclusive initiative, open to qualified applicants from around the world. The program provides resources and support to help affiliates succeed on an international scale. 

Services
Our dedicated affiliate marketing team looks forward to welcoming you aboard the Gotogate Affiliate Marketing program and to expanding our collaboration over the next many years to come. Our customer service team works 24/7 to ensure happy customers no matter where they are situated or what language they speak.

Terms
Brand bidding is not allowed and will result in immediate suspension from our program. Combinations like "Gotogate voucher codes" and "Gotogate cashback" are considered brand bidding, and will result in immediate suspension.As a publisher participating in our affiliate program, you agree not to use the following brand names on your sites in connection with promoting our affiliate offerings: American Airlines, Thai Smile, Delta Airlines, Air Canada, Indigo, Air France, KLM, United Airlines, Alaskan Airlines, Hawaiian Airlines, Ryanair.

Publishers are strictly prohibited from using our brand name in their display URLs or landing page URLs. No usage of our brand name in any form within display URLs and landing page URLs

name: AirAdvisor
description:
Company Overview:


AirAdvisor helps travelers claim compensation for flight delays, cancellations, denied boarding, and baggage issues. We serve millions globally with affordable, effective service. With 27k+ reviews and a 4.7/5 rating, we’re a trusted leader.


	Keywords: “AirAdvisor,” airadvisor.com, or misspellings not allowed in contextual ads. "Baggage claims", and related terms not allowed at this point.
	Benefits: Global claims, 14% lowest fee, 4.7/5 from 27k+ reviews, no win–no fee, multilingual support.
	Audience: Frequent travelers (25–55), leisure/business, digital-savvy, budget-conscious, seeking quick help.
	Services: Delays, cancellations, denied boarding, lost/delayed baggage.
	Publishers: Top sources—OTAs, metas, blogs, comparison, lifestyle, cashback, loyalty, coupon. High CVR in RO, ES, FR, HU, PL; strong US baggage demand.
	Brand: “Leader in claims,” “Lowest fees—no win, no fee.
